org.gephi.branding.desktop

Class MemoryStarvationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gephi.branding.desktop.MemoryStarvationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, NotificationListener

    public class MemoryStarvationManager
extends Object
implements NotificationListener
    Utility class that tracks memory consumption and informs users when the free memory is under 20mb.

    The user has the choice to cancel or let this class increase the maximum memory and reboot. It will also try to save the project.

    Author:
    Mathieu Bastian
